oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Excerpt from the Hillbilly Roundup radio program - KRLD - 1949-05-25 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: [Part one can be found at TR004134_2] Part two of an excerpt from the Hillbilly Roundup radio program, broadcast on May 25, 1949, hosted by Johnny Hicks on KRLD (Dallas, Tex.).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Gene Autry; Johnny Hicks; Hank Williams
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Gene Autry performs "Sunflower" written by Mack David [incomplete] / (1:20) Johnny Hicks requests fan mail for song requests then advertises the Big D Jamboree, Hillbilly Roundup, Hillbilly Hall Of Fame, and the Preview Night programs / (3:30) Red Foley performs "Cleanse Me" / (6:17) Johnny Hicks talks about various performers on the Big D Jamboree; Arthur Smith, Bobby Williamson, and Curley Morgan & Buddy Kelly [phonetic] / (8:05) Hank Williams performs "Wedding Bells" written by Claude Boon [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KRLD (Radio station : Dallas, Tex.); Autry, Gene, 1907-1998; David, Mack, 1912-1993; Hicks, Johnny, 1918-1997; Foley, Red, 1910-1968; Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Boone, Claude, 1916-2007
